Adding CLAUDE.md with task information for AI processing.
This file will be removed when the task is complete.

Issue: https://github.com/Jhon-Crow/godot-topdown-MVP/issues/217

Created enemy character sprites as modular body parts (body, head, arms)
based on the player model structure. The enemy uses black coloring with
white skull decorations on the head/helmet and forearms for visual
distinction from the player's green/military style.

- Added enemy_body.png, enemy_head.png, enemy_left_arm.png, enemy_right_arm.png
- Added enemy_combined_preview.png showing assembled character
- Updated Enemy.tscn to use modular sprite system (EnemyModel node)
- Replaced placeholder texture with proper body part sprites
- Added sprite generation script to experiments/ for reproducibility

Fixes #217
